verbs.description: Kyle Sandilands [V: has] slammed actor Robert De Niro for his anti - Donald Trump tirade at the Tony Awards in New York City on Sunday .
[ARG0: Kyle Sandilands] has [V: slammed] [ARG1: actor Robert De Niro] [ARG2: for his anti - Donald Trump tirade at the Tony Awards in New York City] [ARGM-TMP: on Sunday] .
